subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Seimone Augustus scored 20 points and Lindsay Whalen had 14 points and 5 assists to push the host Minnesota Lynx to the verge of their second title in three seasons.
snippet: Seimone Augustus scored 20 points and Lindsay Whalen had 14 points and 5 assists to push the host Minnesota Lynx to the verge of their second title in three seasons.
